about_the_game:
Discord:



The Bullet Hopper is a time based exploration game with roguelite element and a gun-wielding rabbit. Navigate through the entire game under a time limit to evade the clutches of death! You will have access to guns that propel you forward and upward with their bullets.

Key Features


  • Central Hub: Discover a hub area consisting of a gun emporium, an information center, a palette store, the World Stack, and the pivotal Door that initiates each run.
  • World Stack: Accumulate completed levels in the World stack, affording you the opportunity to rehearse and enhance your performance on each one, gradually becoming swifter and more skilled.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Harness three distinct guns to unleash your movement creativity:

    - Impact: Its bullets launch forwards upon contact, perfect for swift boosts and simple double jumps.
    - Homing: Bullets from this gun track and trail the player upon striking a solid surface, enabling complex double jumps or boost in more intricate environments and scenarios.
    - Bridge: With a higher firing rate and slower bullets, this gun serves as a valuable tool to expertly traverse expansive gaps and execute wall jumps with finesse.

  • Leaderboard: Ascend the leaderboard ranks, earn titles based on your standing among competitors.

Discord:



The Bullet Hopper is a time based exploration game with roguelite element and a gun-wielding rabbit. Navigate through the entire game under a time limit to evade the clutches of death! You will have access to guns that propel you forward and upward with their bullets.

  • Diverse Arsenal: Harness three distinct guns to unleash your movement creativity:

    - Bridge: With a higher firing rate and slower bullets, this gun serves as a valuable tool to expertly traverse expansive gaps and execute wall jumps with finesse.

  • Leaderboard: Ascend the leaderboard ranks, earn titles based on your standing among competitors.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: The Bullet Hopper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A rabbit find itself dead, help it gains its life back in this time limited platformer where knowledge and skills are required. To aid you in this quest, an arsenal of guns is at your disposal, employing their bullets to propel you forward and upward.
